data.title: Karan Singh Grover on his divorces from Jennifer Winget, Shraddha Nigam: 'Everyone has their own s**t to deal with'
meta_keywords: Karan Singh Grover on his divorces from Jennifer Winget

Shraddha Nigam: 'Everyone has their own s**t to deal with'>
<meta property=
data.meta_description: Karan Singh Grover on his divorces from Jennifer Winget, Shraddha Nigam: 'Everyone has their own s**t to deal with'
data.text:
India, June 21 -- Karan Singh Grover is one of the most popular faces on television. The actor is married to Bipasha Basu, and also welcomed daughter Devi in 2022. In a new interview with The Times of India, Karan spoke about his failed marriages, and his divorces from Jennifer Winget and Shraddha Nigam for the first time and said that it 'happened for the best.' (Also read: Jennifer Winget says she was 'lost' after divorce with Karan Singh Grover: 'I went back to my shell')

In the new interview, when Karan was asked to comment about his divorces, he said, "There's nothing good about a breakup or a divorce. Yeah, later when people move on, they realize that it happened for the best. That's a good thing. But I never felt the need to speak...
